name: My Kid Is A Werewolf
description:
Fight against the machine rebellion and don't get eaten by your kid!
Design, art and code by Fabio Esteves
Song: awesomeness by mrpoly (CC0)
Sound effects: generated by SFXR by DrPetter

CONTROLS:
Arrow keys to move up, down, left, arrow. That's all.

OBJECTIVE
(ran out of time to make a tutorial!)
Rescue 10 survivors, the yellow shirt guys.

This is my entry for Ludum Dare 49 Jam, made in 3 days. It's ugly, it's buggy, but it was fun to make it. :)
